00028 
00029 namespace votca {
00030     namespace csg {
00031         using namespace votca::tools;
00032 
00033         class CsgApplication
00034         : public Application {
00035         public:
00036             CsgApplication();
00037             ~CsgApplication();
00038 
00039             void Initialize();
00040             bool EvaluateOptions();
00041 
00042             void Run(void);
00043 
00044             void ShowHelpText(std::ostream &out);
00045 
00047 
00048             virtual bool DoMapping(void) {
00049                 return false;
00050             }
00052 
00053             virtual bool DoMappingDefault(void) {
00054                 return true;
00055             }
00057 
00058             virtual bool DoTrajectory(void) {
00059                 return false;
00060             }
00061 
00062             /* \brief overload and return true to enable threaded calculations */
00063             virtual bool DoThreaded(void) {
00064                 return false;
00065             }
00066 
00067             /* \brief overload and return false to disable synchronized (while threaded) calculations */
00068             virtual bool SynchronizeThreads(void) {
00069                 if (DoThreaded())
00070                     return true;
00071                 else
00072                     return false;
00073             }
00074 
00076 
00077             virtual bool EvaluateTopology(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref = 0) {
00078                 return true;
00079             }
00080 
00081             void AddObserver(CGObserver *observer);
00082 
00084             virtual void BeginEvaluate(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref = 0);
00086             virtual void EndEvaluate();
00087             // \brief called for each frame which is mapped
00088             virtual void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref = 0);
00089 
00090 
00091             // thread related stuff follows
00092 
00107             class Worker : public Thread {
00108             public:
00109 
00110                 Worker();
00111                 ~Worker();
00112 
00114                 virtual void EvalConfiguration(Topology *top, Topology *top_ref = 0) = 0;
00115 
00117                 int getId() {
00118                     return _id;
00119                 }
00120 
00121             protected:
00122                 CsgApplication *_app;
00123                 Topology _top, _top_cg;
00124                 TopologyMap * _map;
00125                 int _id;
00126 
00127                 void Run(void);
00128 
00129                 void setApplication(CsgApplication *app) {
00130                     _app = app;
00131                 }
00132 
00133                 void setId(int id) {
00134                     _id = id;
00135                 }
00136 
00137                 friend class CsgApplication;
00138             };
00139 
00147             bool ProcessData(Worker * worker);
00148 
00154             virtual Worker *ForkWorker(void);
00155 
00160             virtual void MergeWorker(Worker *worker);
00161 
00162         protected:
00163             list<CGObserver *> _observers;
00164             bool _do_mapping;
00165             std::vector<Worker*> _myWorkers;
00166             int _nframes;
00167             bool _is_first_frame;
00168             int _nthreads;
00169             Mutex _nframesMutex;
00170             Mutex _traj_readerMutex;
00171 
00173             std::vector<Mutex*> _threadsMutexesIn;
00175             std::vector<Mutex*> _threadsMutexesOut;
00176             TrajectoryReader * _traj_reader;
00177         };
00178 
00179         inline void CsgApplication::AddObserver(CGObserver *observer) {
00180             _observers.push_back(observer);
00181         }
00182 
00183         inline CsgApplication::Worker::Worker()
00184         : _app(NULL), _map(NULL) , _id(-1) {
00185         }
00186 
00187     }
00188 }
